content: purchasable pdf pattern https //www etsy com/listing/602723872/modern-double-crochet-v_stitch-blanket *i think the double_crochet v_stitch is actually a great beginner stitch once you ve mastered double_crochet because it s pretty easy to always see where you need to insert your hook i love how even the lines turn out and i love that the v stitches make the stripes look like small chevrons* *one thing you should know about this stitch is that it does work up quite loose because of the gaps between the v s so you may want to do a quick practice swatch and experiment with hook sizes * materials * 2 skeins of caron simply soft in white * 1 skein of caron simply soft in light country blue * 1 skein of caron simply soft in gray heather * size h hook * tapestry needle * scissors
